basics.name: Anthony Mosley
basics.label: Computer Science Major at WCU
basics.summary:
Senior CSC student, future Software Programmer/Systems Administrator. My family's college history led me to West Chester University, and my passion for computer science as a whole has kept me going.

The CSC department at WCU has provided me an amazing path to learn the basics and even move forward to more advanced fields within the overall computer science field. During my sophomore year I was in a Work Study within the IT department with a focus on Computer Operations. I worked with a server to set up virtual machines with multiple functions.

During my second year I focused on Full-Stack web development, mostly with a focus on React and Django. Last summer I had an internship with Stoner Solutions in Quarryville, PA as a Network Admin Intern. I came back this past Winter and plan to intern with them again this coming Summer. I'm planning to dive headfirst into Computer Security and finish out one of my last two semesters.

work.name: West Chester University of Pennsylvania
work.summary: Worked with a server to learn about and deploy multiple virtual machines with varying purposes.

work.name: Stoner Inc.
work.summary:
Continued support of multiple departments with technical issues and setup.
Led the setup of Active Directory Services and initiated a successful restructuring of the Active Directory framework.
Researched potential solutions for issues that were slowing the team down.
Spearheaded advanced security measures implementation to enhance network security.

work.name: Stoner Inc.
work.summary:
Collaborated on cross-functional projects, making substantial contributions to team success.
Played a key role in implementing a new phone system (RingCentral) and provided ongoing support.
Delivered comprehensive technology solutions and efficiently resolved departmental issues.
